attributes.action: Stop the idea of any kind of road charging for any vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a labour government bring in a road tax pricing poorer people off the road and giving rich people an advantage. The propoganda must stop and start building a proper road infrustructure based on roads for all users. Labour road charging will also immediately put up the cost of living instantly for everybody!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
